data.message: Just stop dude. You lost your flow. Move on. Mentor the younger rappers if you want to still be useful.

replies.message: He need go back to singing bout homos, homophobia, Vicodin, and his mom
You troll.  Eminems flow is better than ever.  he has to slow it down for dumb pricks like u to even understand it
Really? Because I could understand him just fine at his fastest. You obviously don't know flow.
I'm not even talking entirely about speed. He's stressing things too much. Over pronouncing key words that are important to the song, yet lose meaning when stressed so much.
Not to mention the overly long pauses. He isn't even rapping anymore, he's talking. Anyone who thinks otherwise is deaf.
Eminem hasn't lost anything,  what you a Lil peep fan?  Hip hop nowadays ain't even hip hop.  It's mumble rap😁
Actually no, I've always loved Eminem. But his new stuff needs work. I do like NF though.
Is it because he didn't rap fast? Yeah, everything should be supersonic speed.
Lol no he hasn't lost his flow. This is a thematic song. It's also one song out of his entire collection. I dare you to even come close to his flow.
Have done it many times. At this speed it isn't hard.
And Bill. I literally said it wasn't about speed. Please learn to read before commenting.
He's deliberately playing with the flow
You mean these idiot mumble rap retards?
